Title: Relates to creating a statewide database for unidentified living persons
Summary: Creates a statewide database for unidentified living persons to assist hospitals in identifying unidentified patients admitted to a hospital without any identification and unable to self-identify; provides a standardized process of reacting to requests for information from police and family members of missing persons.
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law, in relation to creating a statewide database for unidentified living persons
